judges: Before Stern, C. J., Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below sustaining defendant’s preliminary objection is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Levinthau, 7 D. & C. 2d 179.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William D. Valente, Assistant City Solicitor, with him David Berger, City Solicitor, and James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Ebald, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.
Argued November 26, 1956.
Before Stern, C. J., Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
January 7, 1957:
Alexander F. Barbieri, for appellant.
William D. Valente, Assistant City Solicitor, with him David Berger, City Solicitor, and James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, for appellee.
